articles.author: James Powel
articles.title: Industrial giant Honeywell announces split into 3 companies after investor pressure - USA TODAY
articles.description: Honeywell, one of the last remaining American industrial giants, announced it will split into three companies Thursday after investor pressure.
articles.content:
Aerospace titan Honeywell announced Thursday that it will split into three independent and publicly traded companies.
